page.title: 11ST.MICHAEL'S CHURCH NESTON
page.content:
{Religion
I go to St. Michael's Church which is an offspring of the Parish Church in Neston. It is a Church of England. Every Sunday I go to Sunday School. Here we act out plays of what happened to Jesus when He was alive, we also read from the Bible and sing. Sometimes our Sunday School teacher reads to us from the Bible. After we have sung, we pray, kneeling on hassocks. Every month we have a family service when our Mums and Dads come to watch. We have communion with a vicar. If you have been confirmed you get a piece of bread and a sip of wine. If you are not confirmed you get a blessing from the vicar.
